column4: I have been experimenting with multiple screens on 10.10 and things have not gone well.  nvidia-settings only shows one device (laptop screen) but the system appears to still think it has 2 screens.  It used to mean playing around with xorg.conf, but this doesn't appear to be used now.  Any pointers for how to resolve this?
does the 2nd monitor clone the first? or is it totally off?
it is now totally off and disconnected.  I have since restarted x and rebooted too.  when I take a screenshot, it still shows as having a screen there (a black area where the screen was)
